DOC.brief_summary: AME non-interventional , prospective , longitudinal multicenter study . This study aim measure relationship antimüllerian hormone serum level ( AMH ) , measure single fully automate assay ( Elecsys® ) initial dose Menopur® Highly Purified-human Menopausal Gonadotrophin ( HP-hMG ) 600 IU/mL prescribe infertile woman undergo first In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) /Intra Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) cycle current practice .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Measure Relationship Between Antimüllerian Hormone Initial Dose Menopur®
DOC.criteria: Women age [ 1842 ] year . Both ovary present . Regular menstrual cycle presume ovulatory . Primary secondary infertility origin 12 month . Patient least one result antimüllerian hormone ( AMH ) measure Elecsys® available inclusion , perform past 12 month inclusion . Candidates eligible first IVF/ICSI cycle Menopur® HPhMG 600 IU/mL prescribed .
